name: @billyfree/eventstore-client
description: A port of the EventStore .Net ClientAPI to Node.js

scripts.test:single: npm run compose:single:start && npm run compose:wait && npm run compose:single:test ; npm run compose:single:stop
scripts.test:gossip: npm run compose:cluster:start && npm run compose:wait && npm run compose:gossip:test ; npm run compose:cluster:stop
scripts.test:cluster: npm run compose:cluster:start && npm run compose:wait && npm run compose:cluster:test ; npm run compose:cluster:stop
scripts.compose:single:test: docker-compose -f docker-compose-single.yaml exec nodejs bash -c "npm i && npm run build && EVENTSTORE_CONNECTION_TYPE=tcp EVENTSTORE_HOST=192.168.33.10 npm run test-debug"
scripts.compose:cluster:test: docker-compose -f docker-compose-cluster.yaml exec nodejs bash -c "npm i && npm run build && EVENTSTORE_CONNECTION_TYPE=gossip EVENTSTORE_HOST=192.168.33.10 EVENTSTORE_HOST_1=192.168.33.10 EVENTSTORE_HOST_2=192.168.33.11 EVENTSTORE_HOST_3=192.168.33.12 npm run test-debug"
scripts.compose:gossip:test: docker-compose -f docker-compose-cluster.yaml exec nodejs bash -c "npm i && npm run build && EVENTSTORE_CONNECTION_TYPE=dns EVENTSTORE_HOST=192.168.33.10 npm run test-debug"
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run gendocs

author: Nicolas Dextraze
